name: Gozo
startIntroPart1: Blessings upon you, noble Priest Saverio Cassar, guardian and leader of Gozo, land of resilience and faith. Through centuries, Gozo has stood against conquerors and storms alike, a peaceful land known for its fortified cities and fishing villages. During the rebellions of 1798, you rose Gozo as a self-governing state, an island that refused to welcome the French invasion. It was only the meaddling British forces that brought down our plans, and disapproved of an independent Gozo.
startIntroPart2: So will you prove the British wrong and lead Gozo to new prosperity? Will you become a center of culture, devotion, and strength? The world watches to see what destiny awaits your people!
declaringWar: We did not seek conflict... but we will defend Gozo with honor.
attacked: Then so be it. Gozo will endure as it always has.
defeated: Our spirit remains, even if we fall.
introduction: Welcome to Gozo, traveler. May peace guide our meeting.
neutralHello: Greetings from the Island of the Three Hills!
hateHello: You come again. Make your intentions clear.
tradeRequest: Perhaps a fair exchange can benefit us both.
hateNo: Illalu, no! How could you want such a thing to happen!
hateYes: I must accept just because I have to.
Whatever, just get out of my sight.

name: Republic of Malta
startIntroPart1: Welcome, Prime Minister of Malta, a modern republic forged from centuries of rule by others. From fortress island to independent nation, Malta now stands as a bridge between continents, cultures, and diplomacy.
startIntroPart2: Will you guide Malta toward prosperity, neutrality, and unity? Or will old divisions return? The future is in your hands.
declaringWar: This is not our wish - but we will defend ourselves.
introduction: Welcome to the Republic of Malta.
uniques: Resting point for Influence with City-States is increased by [1] <every [1] turns>
Gifts of Gold to City-States generate [+20]% more Influence

name: Knights Hospitaller
startIntroPart1: God wills it! Grand Master of the Order of Saint John, defenders of Malta and champions of Christendom. From Rhodes to Malta, your knights built bastions, hospitals, and fleets, standing firm against Ottoman sieges and corsairs alike.
startIntroPart2: Will you defend the faith and the island once more? Or will the cross fall beneath cannon fire? The faithful await your command.
defeated: The Order is scattered... but not forgotten.
hateHello: Watch your words in sacred lands.

name: Melite
startIntroPart1: Ave, Governor of Melite Saint Publius, Roman place of order and law. Under Rome, Malta flourished as a municipium, its roads paved, its harbors secured, and its people bound by Roman citizenship. Temples, villas, and baths stood as proof of imperial stability.
startIntroPart2: Will you uphold Roman discipline and prosperity? Or will Melite fade into provincial obscurity? The Senate watches.
declaringWar: Rome does not hesitate when order is threatened.
defeated: Melite falls... but Rome is eternal.
tradeRequest: Let us discuss terms beneficial to the state.
uniques: [+10]% Production when constructing [all] buildings [in all cities]

name: Maleth
startIntroPart1: Honor to you, Hamilcar, Suffete of Maleth, island of merchants and mariners. Founded by Phoenician traders, Malta became a Punic hub of shipyards and harbors. From Tyre and Carthage came gods, the alphabet, and many new items, carried across the sea by skilled sailors.
startIntroPart2: Will you restore Maleth as a beacon of trade and devotion? Will your ships once more rule the waves? The winds favor the bold.
declaringWar: The sea carries our wrath to your shores.
attacked: Then trade gives way to blood.
defeated: The harbors fall silent... for now.
introduction: Welcome, stranger. You stand in Maleth.
tradeRequest: Let us bargain, as civilized peoples do.

name: British Malta
startIntroPart1: Greetings, Sir Thomas Maitland, Governor of Malta, jewel of the British Mediterranean. Seized during the struggle against Napoleon, Malta became a vital naval fortress of the Empire, guarding sea lanes from Gibraltar to Suez. Dockyards, coaling stations, and red-coated garrisons turned the island into an imperial stronghold.
startIntroPart2: Will you rule with order and industry, projecting British power across the seas? Or will the empire falter under the weight of history? The world watches Britannia's outpost.
declaringWar: For Crown and Empire, we go to war.
attacked: An attack on Malta is an attack on Britain.
defeated: The flag is lowered... but the Empire endures.
introduction: Welcome to British Malta. Let us be civil.
hateHello: I trust you have a reason for this visit.

name: County of Malta
startIntroPart1: Hail to you, noble Count of Malta, Roger the First, vassal of the Crown of Sicily and guardian of these strategic islands. From Arab inheritance to Norman rule, Malta has long stood as a crossroads of empires, governed through feudal law and fortified towns. Under Aragonese banners, your county guarded the central sea, balancing loyalty, tribute, and survival.
startIntroPart2: Will you strengthen Malta's feudal bonds and turn duty into prosperity? Or will your island be swallowed by greater powers once more? The Mediterranean awaits your judgment.
declaringWar: By right of crown and sword, we march to war.
attacked: So the peace is broken. The county shall answer.
defeated: Our fief falls, yet history will remember our rule.
introduction: Welcome to the County of Malta. Speak with respect.
tradeRequest: Perhaps this exchange will serve us both.
hateLetsHearIt: Speak, but do not waste my time.
hateYes: Do not mistake this for goodwill.
